title: Authors and Citation
text: Magno R, Duarte , Gbadamosi , Jawaid (2024). mgi.report.reader: MGI Report Readers. R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/patterninstitute/mgi.report.reader, https://www.pattern.institute/mgi.report.reader.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mgi.report.reader: MGI Report Readers},   author = {Ramiro Magno and Isabel Duarte and Ismail Gbadamosi and Ali Jawaid},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/patterninstitute/mgi.report.reader},   url = {https://www.pattern.institute/mgi.report.reader}, }

title: MGI Report Readers
text: mgi.report.reader provides set functions designed facilitate reading, parsing, analysis MGI (Mouse Genome Informatics) report files.

title: MGI Report Readers
text: can install development version mgi.report.reader like :

title: MGI Report Readers
code: library(mgi.report.reader)  base_url <- "https://www.informatics.jax.org/downloads/reports"  # Import the Mouse Genetic Markers (including withdrawn marker symbols) Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_List1.rpt"), "MRK_List1", n_max = 10L) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1337005 03.MMHAP34FR… DNA segmen… DNA Segment O        NA   11    NA      #>  4 <NA>        0610005A07Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   3     NA      #>  5 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  6 <NA>        0610005K03Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   15    NA      #>  7 <NA>        0610005M07Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   6     NA      #>  8 <NA>        0610006A03Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   4     NA      #>  9 <NA>        0610006A11Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   <NA>  NA      #> 10 <NA>        0610006C01Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   <NA>  NA      #> # ℹ 4 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   synonyms <list> # Import Mouse Genetic Markers (excluding withdrawn marker symbols) Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_List2.rpt"), "MRK_List2", n_max = 10L) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1337005 03.MMHAP34FR… DNA segmen… DNA Segment O        NA   11    NA      #>  4 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  5 MGI:1923503 0610006L08Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   7      7.45e7 #>  6 MGI:1925547 0610008J02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   <NA>  NA      #>  7 MGI:3698435 0610009E02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        18.9 2      2.63e7 #>  8 MGI:1918921 0610009F21Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   16     9.17e7 #>  9 MGI:1918931 0610009K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   4      1.36e7 #> 10 MGI:1914088 0610009L18Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        84.1 11     1.20e8 #> # ℹ 4 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   synonyms <list> # Import the MGI Marker Coordinates' Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MGI_MRK_Coord.rpt"), "MGI_MRK_Coord", n_max = 10L) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id marker_type marker_symbol marker_name  genome_assembly chr    start #>    <chr>     <fct>       <chr>         <chr>        <fct>           <fct>  <int> #>  1 MGI:87853 Gene        a             nonagouti    GRCm39          2     1.55e8 #>  2 MGI:87854 Gene        Pzp           PZP, alpha-… GRCm39          6     1.28e8 #>  3 MGI:87937 Gene        Adrb1         adrenergic … GRCm39          19    5.67e7 #>  4 MGI:87904 Gene        Actb          actin, beta  GRCm39          5     1.43e8 #>  5 MGI:87938 Gene        Adrb2         adrenergic … GRCm39          18    6.23e7 #>  6 MGI:87859 Gene        Abl1          c-abl oncog… GRCm39          2     3.16e7 #>  7 MGI:87939 Gene        Adrb3         adrenergic … GRCm39          8     2.77e7 #>  8 MGI:87862 Gene        Scgb1b27      secretoglob… GRCm39          7     3.37e7 #>  9 MGI:87940 Gene        Grk2          G protein-c… GRCm39          19    4.34e6 #> 10 MGI:87886 Gene        Chrna2        cholinergic… GRCm39          14    6.64e7 #> # ℹ 5 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   provider_collection <fct>, provider_display <fct> # Import the MGI Sequence Coordinates (in GFF format) read_report(file.path(base_url, "MGI_GTGUP.gff"), "MGI_GTGUP", n_max = 10L) #> # A tibble: 10 × 9 #>    marker_id marker_symbol marker_type chr    start    end strand feature_source #>    <chr>     <chr>         <fct>       <fct>  <int>  <int> <fct>  <fct>          #>  1 MGI:6903… Rr15647       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  2 MGI:6914… Rr26566       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  3 MGI:6914… Rr26567       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  4 MGI:6903… Rr15649       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  5 MGI:6914… Rr26568       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  6 MGI:6914… Rr26571       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  7 MGI:6903… Rr15664       Other Geno… 1     3.08e6 3.08e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  8 MGI:6914… Rr26579       Other Geno… 1     3.10e6 3.10e6 <NA>   MGI            #>  9 MGI:6924… Rr36329       Other Geno… 1     3.12e6 3.12e6 <NA>   MGI            #> 10 MGI:6924… Rr36333       Other Geno… 1     3.13e6 3.13e6 <NA>   MGI            #> # ℹ 1 more variable: feature_type <fct> # Import the MGI Marker associations to Sequence (GenBank, RefSeq,Ensembl) information read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_Sequence.rpt"), "MRK_Sequence", n_max = 10L) #> # A tibble: 10 × 19 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  4 MGI:1923503 0610006L08Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   7      7.45e7 #>  5 MGI:1925547 0610008J02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   <NA>  NA      #>  6 MGI:3698435 0610009E02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        18.9 2      2.63e7 #>  7 MGI:1918921 0610009F21Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   16     9.17e7 #>  8 MGI:1918931 0610009K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   4      1.36e7 #>  9 MGI:1914088 0610009L18Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        84.1 11     1.20e8 #> 10 MGI:1915609 0610010K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        43.0 11     7.01e7 #> # ℹ 11 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   genbank_id <chr>, refseq_trp_id <chr>, ensembl_trp_id <chr>, #> #   uniprot_id <chr>, tr_embl_id <chr>, ensembl_prt_id <chr>, #> #   refseq_prt_id <chr>, unigene_id <chr>

title: Mouse chromosomes — chromosomes
text: chromosomes() returns mouse chromosome names.

title: Mouse chromosomes — chromosomes
code: chromosomes(autosomal = TRUE, sexual = TRUE, mitochondrial = TRUE)

title: Mouse chromosomes — chromosomes
text: autosomal Whether include autosomal chromosomes (1 thru 19). sexual Whether include sexual chromosomes (X Y). mitochondrial Whether include mitochondrial chromosome (MT).

title: Mouse chromosomes — chromosomes
text: character vector mouse chromosome names, subset thereof, empty character vector.

title: Genome Feature Type Definitions — feature_types
text: dataset containing different types gene genome features along Sequence Ontology () identifiers definitions.

title: Genome Feature Type Definitions — feature_types
text: tibble 71 rows 3 variables: feature_type Character. type gene genome feature. so_id Character. Sequence Ontology identifier associated feature type. definition Character. definition feature type.

title: Genome Feature Type Definitions — feature_types
text: https://www.informatics.jax.org/userhelp/GENE_feature_types_help.shtml

title: Genome Feature Type Definitions — feature_types
code: feature_types #> # A tibble: 71 × 3 #>    feature_type                so_id      definition                             #>    <chr>                       <chr>      <chr>                                  #>  1 gene                        SO:0000704 A region (or regions) that include al… #>  2 protein coding gene         SO:0001217 A gene that produces at least one tra… #>  3 gene segment                SO:3000000 A gene component region which acts as… #>  4 unclassified gene           NA         A region of the genome associated wit… #>  5 heritable phenotypic marker SO:0001500 A biological region characterized as … #>  6 other feature types         NA         MGI markers that are not classified a… #>  7 QTL                         SO:0000771 A quantitative trait locus (QTL) is a… #>  8 transgene                   SO:0000902 A gene that has been transferred natu… #>  9 non-coding RNA gene         SO:0001263 A gene that produces an RNA transcrip… #> 10 lncRNA gene                 SO:0001877 A gene that encodes a non-coding RNA … #> # ℹ 61 more rows

title: mgi.report.reader: MGI Report Readers — mgi.report.reader-package
text: Provides set functions designed facilitate reading, parsing, analysis MGI (Mouse Genome Informatics) report files: https://www.informatics.jax.org/downloads/reports/index.html.

title: mgi.report.reader: MGI Report Readers — mgi.report.reader-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) Authors: Isabel Duarte iduarte@pattern.institute (ORCID) Ismail Gbadamosi .gbadamosi@nencki.edu.pl (ORCID) Ali Jawaid .jawaid@nencki.edu.pl (ORCID) contributors: Nencki Institute Experimental Biology [copyright holder, funder] University Algarve [copyright holder, funder] Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder]

what: Read a marker list report — read_mrk_list_rpt
title: Read a marker list report — read_mrk_list_rpt
text: read_mrk_list_rpt() imports either MRK_List1.rpt MRK_List2.rpt report file. See MGI Data Statistical Reports details.

title: Read a marker list report — read_mrk_list_rpt
Read a marker list report — read_mrk_list_rpt
text: file Path report file.

title: Read a marker list report — read_mrk_list_rpt
text: tibble following variables (subset ): marker_id Character. unique MGI identifier marker. marker_symbol Character. MGI symbol representing marker. marker_name Character. full name marker. marker_type Factor. type marker (e.g., Gene, BAC/YAC end, DNA segment). status Factor. status marker (e.g., "O" official "W" withdrawn). cM_pos Double. position marker centiMorgans (cM) chromosome. chr Factor. chromosome marker located. start Integer. start position marker chromosome. end Integer. end position marker chromosome. strand Factor. DNA strand marker located (e.g., plus ("+") minus ("-")). feature_type Character. feature type marker (e.g., gene, lncRNA gene, DNA segment). cases sequence ontology term. synonyms List-column. list synonyms marker.

title: Read an MGI report — read_report
text: read_report() reads MGI report.

title: Read an MGI report — read_report
code: read_report(   report_file,   report_type = c("MRK_List1", "MRK_List2", "MGI_MRK_Coord", "MGI_Gene_Model_Coord",     "MGI_GTGUP", "MRK_Sequence"),   n_max = Inf )

title: Read an MGI report — read_report
text: report_file path URL MGI report file. report_type Report type. n_max Maximum number lines read.

title: Read an MGI report — read_report
text: tibble report data tidy format.

title: Read an MGI report — read_report
code: base_url <- "https://www.informatics.jax.org/downloads/reports" n <- 10L  # Import the Mouse Genetic Markers (including withdrawn marker symbols) Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_List1.rpt"), "MRK_List1", n_max = n) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1337005 03.MMHAP34FR… DNA segmen… DNA Segment O        NA   11    NA      #>  4 NA          0610005A07Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   3     NA      #>  5 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  6 NA          0610005K03Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   15    NA      #>  7 NA          0610005M07Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   6     NA      #>  8 NA          0610006A03Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   4     NA      #>  9 NA          0610006A11Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   NA    NA      #> 10 NA          0610006C01Rik withdrawn,… Gene        W        NA   NA    NA      #> # ℹ 4 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   synonyms <list>  # Import Mouse Genetic Markers (excluding withdrawn marker symbols) Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_List2.rpt"), "MRK_List2", n_max = n) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1337005 03.MMHAP34FR… DNA segmen… DNA Segment O        NA   11    NA      #>  4 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  5 MGI:1923503 0610006L08Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   7      7.45e7 #>  6 MGI:1925547 0610008J02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   NA    NA      #>  7 MGI:3698435 0610009E02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        18.9 2      2.63e7 #>  8 MGI:1918921 0610009F21Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   16     9.17e7 #>  9 MGI:1918931 0610009K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   4      1.36e7 #> 10 MGI:1914088 0610009L18Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        84.1 11     1.20e8 #> # ℹ 4 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   synonyms <list>  # Import the MGI Marker Coordinates' Report read_report(file.path(base_url, "MGI_MRK_Coord.rpt"), "MGI_MRK_Coord", n_max = n) #> # A tibble: 10 × 12 #>    marker_id marker_type marker_symbol marker_name  genome_assembly chr    start #>    <chr>     <fct>       <chr>         <chr>        <fct>           <fct>  <int> #>  1 MGI:87853 Gene        a             nonagouti    GRCm39          2     1.55e8 #>  2 MGI:87854 Gene        Pzp           PZP, alpha-… GRCm39          6     1.28e8 #>  3 MGI:87937 Gene        Adrb1         adrenergic … GRCm39          19    5.67e7 #>  4 MGI:87904 Gene        Actb          actin, beta  GRCm39          5     1.43e8 #>  5 MGI:87938 Gene        Adrb2         adrenergic … GRCm39          18    6.23e7 #>  6 MGI:87859 Gene        Abl1          c-abl oncog… GRCm39          2     3.16e7 #>  7 MGI:87939 Gene        Adrb3         adrenergic … GRCm39          8     2.77e7 #>  8 MGI:87862 Gene        Scgb1b27      secretoglob… GRCm39          7     3.37e7 #>  9 MGI:87940 Gene        Grk2          G protein-c… GRCm39          19    4.34e6 #> 10 MGI:87886 Gene        Chrna2        cholinergic… GRCm39          14    6.64e7 #> # ℹ 5 more variables: end <int>, strand <fct>, feature_type <fct>, #> #   provider_collection <fct>, provider_display <fct>  # Import the MGI Sequence Coordinates (in GFF format) read_report(file.path(base_url, "MGI_GTGUP.gff"), "MGI_GTGUP", n_max = n) #> # A tibble: 10 × 9 #>    marker_id marker_symbol marker_type chr    start    end strand feature_source #>    <chr>     <chr>         <fct>       <fct>  <int>  <int> <fct>  <fct>          #>  1 MGI:6903… Rr15647       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 NA     MGI            #>  2 MGI:6914… Rr26566       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 NA     MGI            #>  3 MGI:6914… Rr26567       Other Geno… 1     3.05e6 3.05e6 NA     MGI            #>  4 MGI:6903… Rr15649       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 NA     MGI            #>  5 MGI:6914… Rr26568       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 NA     MGI            #>  6 MGI:6914… Rr26571       Other Geno… 1     3.06e6 3.06e6 NA     MGI            #>  7 MGI:6903… Rr15664       Other Geno… 1     3.08e6 3.08e6 NA     MGI            #>  8 MGI:6914… Rr26579       Other Geno… 1     3.10e6 3.10e6 NA     MGI            #>  9 MGI:6924… Rr36329       Other Geno… 1     3.12e6 3.12e6 NA     MGI            #> 10 MGI:6924… Rr36333       Other Geno… 1     3.13e6 3.13e6 NA     MGI            #> # ℹ 1 more variable: feature_type <fct>  # Import the MGI Marker associations to Sequence (GenBank, RefSeq,Ensembl) information read_report(file.path(base_url, "MRK_Sequence.rpt"), "MRK_Sequence", n_max = n) #> # A tibble: 10 × 19 #>    marker_id   marker_symbol marker_name marker_type status cM_pos chr     start #>    <chr>       <chr>         <chr>       <fct>       <fct>   <dbl> <fct>   <int> #>  1 MGI:1341858 03B03F        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  2 MGI:1341869 03B03R        DNA segmen… BAC/YAC end O        NA   5     NA      #>  3 MGI:1918911 0610005C13Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        29.4 7      4.52e7 #>  4 MGI:1923503 0610006L08Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   7      7.45e7 #>  5 MGI:1925547 0610008J02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   NA    NA      #>  6 MGI:3698435 0610009E02Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        18.9 2      2.63e7 #>  7 MGI:1918921 0610009F21Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   16     9.17e7 #>  8 MGI:1918931 0610009K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        NA   4      1.36e7 #>  9 MGI:1914088 0610009L18Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        84.1 11     1.20e8 #> 10 MGI:1915609 0610010K14Rik RIKEN cDNA… Gene        O        43.0 11     7.01e7 #> #
